summary: A reporter witnesses a brutal murder and becomes entangled in a mystery involving a pair of Siamese twins who were separated at birth, one of them forced to live under the eye of a watchful, controlling psychiatrist.
cast: Chloë Sevigny|Stephen Rea|Lou Doillon|Dallas Roberts|JR Bourne|William B. Davis|Gabrielle Rose|Serge Houde|Alistair Abell|Colin Chapin|Graeme Duffy|Talia Williams|Rachel Williams|Erica Van Briel|David Purvis|Guy Jellis|Ross Viner|Michael Curluck|Dylan Basu|Ashtyn McGuire|Katrina Johnson|Whittni Wright
title: Hermanas de sangre
